mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.clazz_id as clazzId ,a.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,a.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,a.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,a.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,clazz.laoshi_id as clazzLaoshiId ,clazz.clazz_name as clazzName ,clazz.clazz_address as clazzAddress ,clazz.clazz_number as clazzNumber
FROM yonghu a left JOIN clazz clazz ON a.clazz_id = clazz.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and ( a.clazz_id = #{params.clazzId} )
and a.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and a.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and a.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and a.clazz_id IS NOT NULL
and clazz.laoshi_id = #{params.laoshiId}
and clazz.clazz_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.clazzName},'%')
and clazz.clazz_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.clazzAddress},'%')
and clazz.clazz_number >= #{params.clazzNumberStart}
and clazz.clazz_number <= #{params.clazzNumberEnd}
and clazz.clazz_number = #{params.clazzNumber}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(clazz.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(clazz.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
